courseDetails.title: Trauma Informed Care for Leadership || Essential Training ||
courseDetails.shortDescription: Promoting resilience & healing through Trauma-Informed approaches & how to respond to stress & pain points in workplace.
targetAudiences: Who wants to learn about Trauma and become a Trauma-Informed Leader
Who wants to reduce their stress and pain points in the workplace

The trauma-informed leader course is designed for individuals who are interested in learning about the impact of trauma on individuals and communities, and how to apply a trauma-informed approach in their work or leadership role. This course is suitable for a wide range of professionals, including educators, healthcare providers, social workers, law enforcement officers, community leaders, and business executives. The course aims to equip participants with the knowledge and skills to create safe, supportive, and empowering environments that promote healing and resilience for individuals and communities who have experienced trauma
